title: Sara Gilbert
summary: Sara Gilbert (born Sara Rebecca Abeles; January 29, 1975)[1] is an American actress, director, and producer known for her role as Darlene Conner on the ABC sitcom Roseanne (1988â€“1997; 2018), for which she received two Primetime Emmy Award nominations.[2] She is also creator and former co-host of the CBS daytime talk show The Talk and had a recurring role as Leslie Winkle on CBS's The Big Bang Theory.
